body:
And if I change the code 

```
torch.save(self.net.state_dict(), save_path)
```

to 

```
torch.save(self.net.cpu().state_dict(), save_path)
```

it works.

Until now, there are some methods to overcome it, but I really hope pytorch can fix it.
